definitions.text: of concern to or concerning the affairs of other nations (other than your own)
relating to or originating in or characteristic of another place or part of the world
examples: on business in a foreign city

definitions.text: not contained in or deriving from the essential nature of something
examples: an economic theory alien to the spirit of capitalism
the mysticism so foreign to the French mind and temper
jealousy is foreign to her nature

definitions.text: not belonging to that in which it is contained; introduced from an outside source
